meanings.definition: Feeling or showing anxiety or worry
meanings.sent1: She looked angstier than usual today.
meanings.sent2: The stormy weather made her feel even angstier.
meanings.sent3: His angstier expression when facing a spider always makes me chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The looming deadline cast an even angstier shadow over her.
meanings.sent5: The eerie silence in the haunted house made her feel even angstier.

meanings.definition: More anxious or worried than someone or something else
meanings.sent1: Out of all her friends, she seemed the angstier one.
meanings.sent2: He became even angstier when he heard the bad news.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked angstier than the dog during the thunderstorm.
meanings.sent4: The old house appeared even angstier in the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: The dark forest felt angstier than any place she had been before.
